analysis.description:
CraftR.annualPos (/unique_contracts/0xf19eac69f9566f0b40660bd0cc16234330f38456.sol#241-252) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 0
	- (_now.sub(stakeStartTime)).div(220752000) == 1
